title: You can get this Nvidia RTX 4090 Ti/Titan cooler for an unhinged $120K - but why?
description: More images of the supposed RTX 4090 Ti/Titan GPU emerge alongside its cooler's online listing, which is going for a shockingly high price.

title: Future Galaxy Watch upgrade could finally make it reliable for people with tattoos
description: Finally addressing a long-standing problem for smartwatches, Samsung plans on releasing the fix before the end of the year.

title: These Samsung phone flaws have been exploited by spyware
description: Top US security agency adds more Samsung mobile vulnerabilities to its catalog, with some already exploited.

title: This nifty new feature gives Google Calendar a badly-needed upgrade
description: Google Calendar is getting a new feature that will let you share events with large groups of people.

title: Don't be fooled by fake ads for this file transfer service - they could lead to malware
description: BlackCat, AKA ALPHV, is now trying its luck with fake ads for a popular file transfer service in order to spread multi-purpose malware.

title: Meta teases Twitter alternative and we're ready to pull these Threads
description: Meta's new app, Threads, is a direct Twitter alternative that just popped up on the Google Play Store - albeit very briefly.

title: CEOs are really getting on board with AI - but is that a good thing?
description: The C-Suite is favoring AI for productivity, customer services, and even cybersecurity, but workers aren’t happy.

title: Meta's new Facebook parental controls show social media still doesn't like responsibility
description: New parental controls are better than nothing - but Meta needs to step up.

title: Modder shrinks legendary Game Boy Camera down to the size of an original GameBoy cartridge
description: The Game Boy Mini Camera is a more pocketable version of the original, and keeps the same 0.1MP grayscale sensor

title: Adobe Figma deal thrown into jeopardy following CMA probe
description: Adobe has 5 days to respond to CMA as competition concerns grow over $20 billion Figma merger.

title: Apple isn't making game controllers for Vision Pro - Microsoft and Sony may have it covered
description: Apple is adamant that the Vision Pro is a controller-free zone, even for gaming – but it'll work with third party controllers.

title: TSMC denies ransomware hack as gang demands multi-million dollar ransom
description: LockBit is asking for $70 million, but it seems to be knocking on the wrong door.

title: Windows 11 goes from strength to strength with PC gamers – but not everyone else
description: There’s an increasing gulf between the numbers of gamers and everyday users who’ve switched to Windows 11.

title: This sneaky new malware is targeting macOS devices without them noticing - here's what you need to know
description: An update to a known malware makes it harder to detect, and researchers are linking it to North Korea.

title: iOS 17 won’t include 3 of its most useful features at launch
description: Apple has confirmed that a handful of iOS 17 features won't be arriving until after the update's initial launch.

title: Microsoft Teams will now hide any evidence of your potty mouth
description: Live captions and Microsoft Teams transcripts will now hide any unsuitable language.

title: You can now buy Samsung's 98-inch QLED 4K TV for an even more affordable price
description: It's hardly a budget set, but we think you'll be surprised by the relatively low price of this big screen QLED TV from Samsung.

title: This WordPress plugin grants hackers 'ultimate' admin access to your site
description: Hackers exploiting this vulnerability can add themselves as a WordPress admin to your site, so patch now.

title: Windows 11 SSD slowdown bug has been hanging around for months – and people are fed up
description: Microsoft, what’s up with that Windows 11 SSD bug still being a problem? Get it sorted...

title: Apple is working on a new hearing test feature for AirPods Pro, but you'll have to wait
description: Your favorite Apple earbuds could soon help spot signs of hearing loss before it becomes a problem – and that's not all

title: Classic mech-'em-up RPG Front Mission 1st: Remake has landed on PC
description: The 1995 classic has released for PC after last year's Switch launch

title: Many companies are still struggling with sustainability goals, and the C-suite may to blame
description: CEOs are passing the buck to CTOs, but even they are failing to reach ‘tech zero’ on the road to ultimate sustainability.

title: Apple may be planning a new display that could turn into a smart TV
description: Rumors are brewings about new Apple Studio Displays and I'm buzzing.

title: Twitter crisis explained: what are rate limits and when will they end?
description: Struggling to use Twitter right now? Here’s everything Elon Musk did wrong.

title: Apple TV Plus pulls a Netflix by canceling one of its acclaimed TV shows in record time
description: High Desert, a comedy series that only arrived on Apple TV Plus in late May, has already been dumped by the streamer.

title: The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 5 might not get its most promising rumored feature
description: The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 5 reportedly won't have an IP58 rating, so dust could be a real issue for it.

title: Dying Light 2's crossover with The Walking Dead is a thrilling fight for survival
description: Two major zombie horror brands, The Walking Dead and Dying Light are teaming up for a new update.

title: The last of Diablo 4's rarest items has finally dropped, and it's a game changer
description: The last of Diablo 4's six rarest items has finally dropped, and it has powers that fundamentally change the game for any who use it.

title: Workers are wasting huge amounts of time on tasks that achieve very little
description: Slack says businesses are more focused on productivity than measurable outcomes, leading to wasted time.

title: BT and HPE team up to boost LAN across the globe
description: Broadband-hungry collaboration apps are putting a strain on LAN services everywhere.

title: 40 CS:GO traders have been banned by Valve in latest crackdown
description: Valve has banned around 40 CS:GO traders in an effort to crack down on an emergent cryptocurrency scheme.

title: Will the iPhone 15 have Touch ID? Here’s everything we know
description: Will Apple bring back the Touch ID fingerprint sensor for the iPhone 15 line?

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Monday, July 3 (game #525)
